scripts.gen:services: npm run gen:product-service && npm run gen:identity-service && npm run gen:shopping-cart-service && npm run gen:order-service && npm run gen:payment-service
scripts.gen:product-service: rm -rf src/generated/product-service && openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec src/generated/product-service.yaml --generator-name typescript-axios --output src/generated/product-service/ --config src/generated/product-service.json && cd src/generated/product-service/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.gen:identity-service: rm -rf src/generated/identity-service && openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec src/generated/identity-service.yaml --generator-name typescript-axios --output src/generated/identity-service/ --config src/generated/identity-service.json && cd src/generated/identity-service/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.gen:shopping-cart-service: rm -rf src/generated/shopping-cart-service && openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec src/generated/shopping-cart-service.yaml --generator-name typescript-axios --output src/generated/shopping-cart-service/ --config src/generated/shopping-cart-service.json && cd src/generated/shopping-cart-service/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.gen:order-service: rm -rf src/generated/order-service && openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec src/generated/order-service.yaml --generator-name typescript-axios --output src/generated/order-service/ --config src/generated/order-service.json && cd src/generated/order-service/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.gen:payment-service: rm -rf src/generated/payment-service && openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec src/generated/payment-service.yaml --generator-name typescript-axios --output src/generated/payment-service/ --config src/generated/payment-service.json && cd src/generated/payment-service/ && npm install && npm run build
